snippet.title: Prototype: A Game Master is Needed (Online Escape Game)
snippet.description:
A challenging puzzle game in escape room style.

https://edaqa.link/EdaqasRoom-Prototype-YT

You've applied for a new job, an amazing role as a game master at a brand new escape room. Alas, a mishap has you trapped in the very room you're supposed to run. Can you get out before the vampires* come?

    👥 A 2 - 4 player game full of puzzles and adventure, or at least puzzles. (Solo play is also possible)
    🖼️ Thrilling photo-realistic graphics... assuming you live in a clip-art world!
    ⏰ Our test players have been taking around 90 minutes to complete the game.
    🕹️ State-of-the-art technology sure to impress your browser. (See requirements below)

*There are no vampires, but you might get hungry if you take too long.
